span.span: The type of the return value of the activity.

summary.span: 用于从预先存在的 对象创建复合活动的抽象基类，此类使用活动的类型说明符指定结果类型。

span.span: An abstract base class used to create composite activities from pre-existing objects, which specifies a result type using the activity’s type specifier.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是活动类型层次结构中的基类。 is the base class in the activity type hierarchy. 所有具有泛型类型定义的其他活动类型（例如 、、 和 ）均是从此类派生的。All other activity types with generic type definitions such as , , , and derive from this class. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何从 派生类。The following example shows how to derive a class from . [!code-csharp[HelloWorld#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/helloworld/cs/appendstring.cs#0)]
